channel.title: Drawing, Moving and Seeing with Code - Spring 2025
channel.description: Website for the course Drawing, Moving and Seeing with Code at Purchase College, Spring 2025

item.title: Week 1 - Intro to the course and Turtle Geometry
item.description:
[Turtle]
Today
- Hello! - Intro - What will we be learning? - Syllabus and our plans for the semester - Turtle Geometry and Computing with LOGO - Begin devlogs

item.description:
[An iceberg’s meandering path] Image uploaded to Are.na by Jon-Kyle Mohr
Today
- Randomness - p5.js overview - Iceberg activities - HW: Devlog 2
Javascript!

item.title: Week 3 - Automatons and Self-Drawing Machines
item.description:
Today
- warmup - Harold Cohen and AARON - Automatons - p5.js - arrays and classes
Warmup
Random walk music.

item.title: Week 4 - Random Seeding
item.description:
Today
- Artist talk: Jonah Senzel - what is randomness to a computer? - Seeding Randomness - “Daily challenges”
Visiting artist
Jonah Senzel - Composition, New Media, Interactive Arts

item.title: Week 5 - Random Robots / Motion with vectors
item.description:
Today
Vectors and Autonomous objects: drawing, driving, picking things up
- Log reviews of “daily seeding” - vectors and motion - vector math - objects and pickups
Vectors

item.title: Week 6 - Cellular Automata and the Game of Life
item.description:
Today
- Log reviews of “daily seeding” - The Game of Life
A-life
